subject: More biblical spirits?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Another test of the AGC circuit on AM, you should be able ot hear teh gain
jump between stations--I thinksa that's where the littel whistle is coming
from. In the middle is "...Saul This Is Thomas...".

F-S
